title: Funding and Coordinating Python Projects via Non-Profits
summary:
Organizations like Software Freedom Conservancy and PSF provide
essential non-profit infrastructure to the Python community. For the
past few years, Conservancy specifically helped raise funds to support 3
key Python projects: Mercurial, PyPy and Twisted. This talk discusses
successes and challenges of funding Python software development in
non-profits, and discuss plans to expand this activity.
